author: Damian Windsor
description: Pronounced "Tea-You-One-Na" this is basically a Tommy's Margarita topped with cucumber foam.
name: Tijuana Brass

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
Top with cucumber foam (fill a cream whipper two-thirds full with equal parts cucumber juice, 1:1 simple syrup and egg white, charge with two CO2 cartridges and chill)
